column6: went to be with the lord
column10: at his home with his loving wife and family by his side. he was a life-long member of amis chapel united methodist church. he was preceded in death by his 1st wife and mother of his children
column11: betty henderson. he is survived by his wife
column14: debbie moore (henry) and bill henderson (lisa); 6 grandchildren and 1 great-grandchild; 2 brothers
column15: kenneth henderson (evelyn) and donald henderson; and sister
column17: nephews and a host of extended family and friends. the family would like to thank all their friends who were kind enough to come by and visit with mr. henderson and especially rev. bob holt. they greatly appreciate your love and support. the family will receive friends from 5:00 pm 7:00 pm on monday
column19: 2015 at amis chapel united methodist church in surgoinsville. funeral services will begin at 7:00 pm with rev. george winegar
column20: rev. mike cutshaw and eulogist roy boggs officiating. special music will be provided by dennis neeley. graveside service will be held at 10:00 am on tuesday
column22: 2015 at armstrong cemetery. online condolences may be sent to the family at www. cartertrent. com. carter-trent funeral home in church hill is proudly serving the henderson family. upcoming events. visitationjun 22. 5:00 pm - 7:00 pm amis chapel umc122 amis chapel rd. surgoinsville
